Aye logon jo iman laye ho jab tum apas mein poshida baat karo to gunaah aur zyadati aur Rasool ki nafarmani ki baatein nahin, balkey neki aur taqwa ki baatein karo aur us khuda se darte raho jiske huzoor tumhein hashr mein pesh hona hai

Kana-phusi (Whispering) to ek shaytani kaam hai, aur woh isliye ki jati hai ke iman laney waley log ussey ranjeedha hon, halanke bay-izan-e-khuda (except by Allahs will) woh unhein kuch bhi nuksaan nahin pahuncha sakti, aur momino ko Allah hi par bharosa rakhna chahiye

Aey logon jo iman laye ho, jab tumse kaha jaye ke apni majlison mein kushadgi paida karo(Make room) to jagah kushada kardiya karo, Allah tumhein kushadgi bakhshega. Aur jab tumse kaha jaye ke uth jao to uth jaya karo, tum mein se jo log iman rakhne waley hain aur jinko ilm bakhsha gaya hai, Allah unko buland darje ata farmayega. Aur jo kuch tum karte ho Allah ko uski khabar hai

Aey logon jo iman laye ho, jab tum Rasool se takhliye (privacy) mein baat karo to baat karne se pehle kuch sadaqa do. Yeh tumhare liye behtar aur pakeeza-tarr hai. Albatta agar tum sadaqa dene ke liye kuch na pao to Allah Gafoor-o-Raheem hai

Kya tum darr gaye is baat se ke takhliye (privacy) mein guftagu karne se pehle tumhein sadaqaat dene hongey? Accha, agar tum aisa na karo aur Allah ne tumko issey maaf kardiya to namaz qayam karte raho, zakaat dete raho aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki itaat karte raho. Tum jo kuch karte ho Allah ussey bakhabar hai

Kya tumne dekha nahin un logon ko jinhon ne dost banaya hai ek aisey giroh (people) ko jo Allah ka magzoob (gazabnaak/ Wrath) hai? Woh na tumhare hain na unke, aur wo jaan boojh kar jhooti baat par kasamein khate hain
Allah Ne unke liye sakht azaab muhayya kar rakkha hai. Badey hi burey kartoot hain jo woh kar rahey hain
Unhon ne apni kasamo ko dhaal bana rakkha hai jiski aadh(shield) mein woh Allah ki raah se logon ko roakte hain. Ispar unke liye zillat ka azaab hai
Allah se bachane ke liye na unke maal kuch kaam aayege na unki aulad .Woh dozakh ke yaar hain, usi mein woh hamesha rahenge

Jis roz Allah un sab ko uthayega, woh uske saamne bhi usi taraah kasamein kahyenge jis tarah tumhare saamne khate hain, aur apne nazdeek yeh samajhenge ke issey unka kuch kaam ban jayega. Khoob jaan lo woh parle daraje ke jhootey hain
Shaytaan unpar musallat ho chuka hai aur usne khuda ki yaad unke dil se bhula di hai.Woh shaytaan ki party ke log hain. Khabardaar ho, shaytaan ki party waley hi khasarey mein rehne waley hai
Yaqeenan zaleel tareen makhlooqat mein se hain woh log jo Allah aur uske Rasool ka muqabla karte hain
Allah ne likh diya hai ke main aur mere Rasool ghalib hokar rahenge. Fil waqey Allah zabardast aur zoarawar (most strong) hai

Tum kabhi yeh na paogey ke jo log Allah aur aakhirat par iman rakhne waley hain woh un logon se muhabbat karte hon jinhon ne Allah aur uske rasool ki mukhalifat ki hai , khwa woh unke baap hoon, ya unke betay, ya unke bhai ya unke ehle khandaan. Yeh woh log hain jinke dilon mein Allah ne iman sabt (inscribe/written) kar diya hai aur apni taraf se ek rooh ata karke unko quwwat bakshi hai, Woh unko aisey jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi. Unmein woh hamesha rahenge. Allah un se razi (pleased) hua aur woh Allah se razi huey.Woh Allah ki party ke log hain. Khabardar raho, Allah ki party waley hi falaah paney waley hain
Allah hi ki tasbeeh ki hai har us cheez ne jo aasmano aur zameen mein hai, aur wahi ghalib aur hakeem hai

Wahi hai jisne ehle kitaab kafiron ko pehle hi hamle mein unke gharon se nikaal bahar kiya.Tumhein hargiz yeh gumaan na tha ke woh nikal jayenge aur woh bhi yeh samjhe baitey thay ke unki gadiyan (fortresses) unhein Allah se bacha lengi.Magar Allah aisey rukh se un par aaya jidhar unka khayal bhi na gaya tha. Usney unke dilon mein roab (terror) daal diya, nateeja yeh hua ke woh khud apne haathon se bhi apne gharon ko barbaad kar rahey thay aur momino ke haathon bhi barbaad karwa rahey thay. Pas ibrat haasil karo aey deedha-e-beena (perceptive eyes) rakhne walon
Agar Allah ne unke haqq mein jila watani (banishment) na likh di hoti to duniya hi mein woh unhein azaab de daalta. Aur aakhirat mein to unke liye dozakh ka azaab hai hi
Yeh sab kuch isliye hua ke unhon ne Allah aur uske Rasool ka muqabla kiya. Aur jo bhi Allah ka muqabla karey Allah usko saza dene mein bahut sakht hai

Tum logon ne khajooron (dates) ke jo darakht kaate ya jinko apne jadhon (roots) par khada rehne diya, yeh sab Allah hi ke izan se tha aur (Allah ne yeh izan isliye diya) taa-ke faasiqon ko zaleel-o-khaar karey

Aur jo maal Allah ne unke kabze se nikal kar apne Rasool ki taraf palta diye, woh aisey maal nahin hai jinpar tumne apne ghodey (horses) aur ount (camels) daudaye hon. Balke Allah apne Rasoolon ko jispar chahta hai tasallut (authority/galaba) ata farma deta hai. Aur Allah har cheez par qadir hai

Jo kuch bhi Allah in bastiyon ke logon se apne Rasool ki tarf palta de woh Allah , aur Rasool, aur rishtedaron , aur yatama (orphans), aur masakeen, aur musafiron, ke liye hai taa-ke woh tumhare maaldaaron hi ke darmiyan gardish na karta rahey. Jo kuch Rasool tumhein de woh lelo aur jis cheez se woh tum ko roak dey ussey ruk jao. Allah se daro, Allah sakht saza dene wala hai

(Neiz woh maal) un gareeb muhajireen ke liye hai jo apne gharon aur jaidaadon se nikaal bahar kiye gaye hain. Yeh log Allah ka fazal aur uski khushnudi chahte hain aur Allah aur uske Rasool ki himayat par qamar-basta rehte hai. Yahi raast baaz ( truthful ) log hain

(Aur woh un logon ke liye bhi hai) jo in muhajireen ki aamad se pehle hi iman laa kar daar-ul-hijrat [abode (of Hijrah)] mein muqeem thay. Yeh un logon se muhabbat karte hain jo hijrat karke inke paas aaye hain aur jo kuch bhi unko de diya jaye uski koi haajat tak yeh apne dilon mein mehsoos nahin karte aur apni zaat par dusron ko tarjeeh dete hain, khwa apni jagah khud mohtaj hon. Haqeeqat yeh hai ke jo log apne dil ki tangi se bacha liye gaye wahi falaah paney waley hain

(Aur woh un logon ke liye bhi hai) jo un logon ke baad aaye hain, jo kehte hain ke “Aey hamare Rubb, humein aur hamare un sab bhaiyon ko baksh de jo humse pehle iman laye hain aur hamare dilon mein ehle iman ke liye koi bugz (rancour) na rakh. Aey hamare Rubb, tu bada meharbaan aur raheem hai”

Tumne dekha nahin un logon ko jinhon ne munafiqat (hypocrisy) ki rawish ikhtiyar ki hai? Yeh apne kafir ehle kitaab bhaiyon se kehte hain "agar tumhein nikala gaya to hum tumhare saath niklenge, aur tumhare maamle mein hum kisi ki baat hargiz na manenge, aur agar tumse jung ki gayi to hum tumhari madad karenge" magar Allah gawah hai ke yeh log qataii jhootey hain

Agar woh nikale gaye to yeh unke saath hargiz na niklenge, aur agar unse jung ki gayi to yeh unki hargiz madad na karenge, aur agar yeh unki madad karein bhi to peet phair jayenge aur phir kahin se koi madad na payenge
Inke dilon mein Allah se badh kar tumhara khauf hai, isliye ke yeh aisey log hain jo samajh boojh nahin rakhte

Yeh kabhi ikatthey hokar ( khule maidan mein ) tumhara muqabla na karenge, ladenge bhi to qila-band bastiyon ( fortified townships) mein baith kar ya deewaron ke peechay chup kar. Yeh aapas ki mukhalifat mein baday sakht hain. Tum unhein ikhatta samajte ho magar inke dil ek dusre se phatey huey hain. Inka yeh haal isliye hai ke yeh be aqal log hain
Yeh unhi logon ke manind hain jo insey thodi hi muddat pehle apne kiye ka maza chakh chuke hain aur inke liye dardnaak azaab hai

Inki misal shaytaan ki si hai ke pehle woh insan se kehta hai kufr kar, aur jab Insan kufr kar baithta hai to woh kehta hai main tujhse bari-uz-zimma hoon, mujhey to Allah Rabb-ul-aalameen se darr lagta hai
Phir dono ka anjaam yeh hona hai ke hamesha ke liye jahannum mein jayein, aur zaalimon ki yahi jaza hai
Aey logon jo iman laye ho, Allah se daro, Aur har shaks yeh dekhe ke usne kal ke liye kya samaan kiya hai. Allah se darte raho, Allah yaqeenan tumhare un sab aamaal se ba-khabar hai jo tum karte ho
Un logon ki taraah na ho jao jo Allah ko bhool gaye to Allah ne unhein khud apna nafs bhula diya. yahi log faasiq hain
Dozakh mein jaane wale aur jannat mein jaane wale kabhi yaksan nahin ho sakte. Jannat mein janey waley hi asal mein kamiyaab hain

Agar humne yeh Quran kisi pahad(mountain) par bhi utaar diya hota to tum dekhte ke woh Allah ke khauff se daba jaa raha hai, aur phata padta hai. Yeh misalein hum logon ke saamne isliye bayaan karte hain ke woh (apne halaat par) gaur karein
Woh Allah hi hai jiske siwa koi maabood nahin, gayab aur zaahir har cheez ka jaanne wala, wahi Rehman aur Raheem hai

Woh Allah hi hai jiske siwa koi maabood nahin woh Badshah hai, nihayat muqaddas , sarasar salamati (all-peace), aman dene wala( Giver of security), nigehbaan, sab par ghalib, apna hukum ba-zoar naafiz karne wala, aur bada hi hokar rehne wala. Paak hai Allah us shirk se jo log kar rahey hain

Woh Allah hi hai, jo takhleeq( creation) ka mansuba(plan) banane wala, aur usko nafiz karne wala, aur uske mutabik surat-gari (fashioner) karne wala hai. Uske liye behtareen naam hain. Har cheez jo aasmano aur zameen mein hai uski tasbeeh kar rahi hai, aur woh zabardast aur Hakeem hai

Aey logon jo iman laye ho, agar tum meri raah mein jihad karne ke liye aur meri raza-joyi ki khatir (watan chodh kar gharon se) nikle ho to mere aur apne dushmano ko dost na banao. Tum unke saath dosti ki tarah(befriend) dalte ho, halaanke jo haqq tumhare paas aaya hai usko maanne se woh inkar kar chuke hain. Aur unki ravish yeh hai ke Rasool ko aur khud tumko sirf is kasoor par jila-watan (expel) karte hain ke tum apne Rubb, Allah par iman laye ho. Tum chupa kar unko dostana paighaam bhejte ho, halaanke jo kuch tum chupa kar karte ho aur jo elania (openly) karte ho, har cheez ko mai khoob janta hoon. Jo shaks bhi tum mein se aisa karey woh yaqeenan raah-e-raast se bhatak gaya
Unka rawayya to yeh hai ke agar tumpar qaabu paa jayein to tumhare saath dushmani karein aur haath aur zuban se tumhein azar (hurt) dein, woh to yeh chahte hain ke tum kisi tarah kafir ho jao
Qayamat ke din na tumhari rishtedarian kisi kaam aayengi na tumhari aulad. Us roz Allah tumhare darmiyan judaai daal dega. Aur wahi tumhare aamaal ka dekhne wala hai

Tum logon ke liye Ibrahim aur uske saathiyon mein ek accha namuna hai ke unhon ne apni qaum se saaf kehdiya “hum tumse aur tumhare in maboodon (deities) se jinko tum khuda ko chodh kar poojhte ho qataii bezaar hain. Humne tumse kufr kiya aur hamare aur tumhare darmiyan hamesha ke liye adawat hogayi aur bair padh gaya (enmity and hatred) jabtak tum Allah wahid par iman na lao”. Magar Ibrahim ka apne baap se yeh kehna (issey mustasna hai) ke “ Main aapke liye magfirat ki darkhwast zaroor karunga, aur Allah se aap ke liye kuch haasil kar lena mere bas mein nahin hai”. (Aur Ibrahim va ashaab-e-Ibrahim ki dua yeh thi ke) “Aey hamare Rubb, tere hi upar humne bharosa kiya aur teri hi taraf humne ruju (turn) karliya aur tere hi huzoor humein palatna hai
Aey hamare Rubb, humein kafiron ke liye fitna (trial/test) na bana de aur aey hamare Rubb, hamare kasooron se darguzar farma. Beshak tu hi zabardast (mighty) aur daana(wise) hai

Inhi logon ke tarz-e-amal mein tumhare liye aur har us shaks ke liye accha namuna (example) hai jo Allah aur roz-e-aakhir ka umeedwar ho. Issey koi munharif ho (turns away) to Allah be niyaz (All-Sufficient) aur apni zaat mein aap mahmood hai
Baeed nahin ke Allah kabhi tumhare aur un logon ke darmiyaan mohabbat daal de jinse aaj tumne dushmani mol li hai. Allah badi qudrat rakhta hai aur woh gafoor-o-raheem hai

Allah tumhein is baat se nahin roakta ke tum un logon ke saath neki aur insaaf ka bartaao karo jinhon ne deen ke maamle mein tumse jung nahin ki hai aur tumhein tumhare gharon se nahin nikala hai. Allah insaaf karne walon ko pasand karta hai

Woh tumhein jis baat se roakta hai woh to yeh hai ke tum un logon se dosti karo jinhon ne tumse deen ke maamle mein jung ki hai aur tumhein tumhare gharon se nikala hai aur tumhare ikhraaj (expulsion) mein ek dusre ki madad ki hai. Unse jo log dosti karein wahi zaalim hain

Aey logon jo iman laye ho, jab momin auratein hijrat karke tumhare paas aayein to (unke momin honay ki) jaanch padtaal karlo. Aur unke iman ki haqeeqat Allah hi behtar janta hai. Phir jab tumhein maloom ho jaye ke woh momin hain to unhein kuffar ki taraf wapas na karo. Na woh kuffar ke liye halal hain aur na kuffar unke liye halal. Unke kafir shoharon ne jo mehar unko diye thay woh unhein pher do aur unsey nikah kar lene par tumse koi gunaah nahin jabke tum unke mehar unko ada kardo. Aur tum khud bhi kafir auraton ko apne nikah mein na roakey raho, jo mehar tumne apni kafir biwiyon ko diye thay woh tum wapas maang lo aur jo mehar kafiron ne apni musalmaan biwiyon ko diye thay unhein woh wapas maang lein. Yeh Allah ka hukum hai, woh tumhare darmiyaan faisla karta hai aur Allah Aleem-o-Hakeem (all knowing-most wise) hai

Aur agar tumhari kafir biwiyon ke meharon mein se kuch tumhein kuffar se wapas na miley aur phir tumhari naubat aaye to jin logon ki biwiyan udhar reh gayi hain unko itni rakam ada kardo jo unke diye huey meharon ke barabar ho. Aur us khuda se darte raho jispar tum iman laye ho

Aey Nabi, Jab tumhare paas momin auratein bayt (pledge) karne ke liye aayein aur is baat ka ahad karein ke woh Allah ke saath kisi cheez ko shareek na karengi, chori na karengi, zina na karengi, apni aulad ko qatal na karengi, apne haath paaon ke aage koi bohtan (calumny) ghad kar na layengi, Aur kisi amr-e-maaroof (anything known to be good) mein tumhari nafarmani na karengi, to unse bayt lelo aur unke haqq mein Allah se dua-e-magfirat karo. Yaqeenan Allah darguzar(maaf) farmane wala aur Reham karne wala hai
Aey logon jo iman laye ho, un logon ko dost na banao jinpar Allah ne gazab farmaya hai, Jo aakhirat se usi tarah mayous hain jis tarah kabaron mein padey huey kafir mayous hain
Allah ki tasbeeh ki hai har us cheez ne jo aasmano aur zameen mein hai, Aur woh ghalib (Mighty) aur Hakeem (wise) hai
Aey logon jo iman laye ho, tum kyun woh baat kehte ho jo karte nahin ho
Allah ke nazdeek yeh sakht na pasandeeda harakat hai ke tum kaho woh baat jo karte nahin
Allah ko to pasand woh log hain jo uski raah mein is tarah saff-basta(row) hokar ladte hain goya ke woh ek sisa pilayi hui deewar hain

Aur yaad karo Moosa ki woh baat jo usne apni qaum se kahi thi “Aey meri qaum ke logon, tum kyun mujhey aziyat (torment /harm) dete ho halaanke tum khoob jaante ho ke main tumhari taraf Allah ka bheja hua Rasool hoon? Phir jab unhon ne tedh ikhtiyar ki (deviated) to Allah ne unke dil tedhey (deviant) kardiye, Allah faasiqon ko hidayat nahin deta

Aur yaad karo Isa ibn-e-Maryam ki woh baat jo usne kahi thi ke “Aey bani Israel, main tumhari taraf Allah ka bheja hua Rasool hoon, Tasdeeq (verify/confirm) karne wala hoon us Taurat ki jo mujhse pehle aayi hui maujood hai, aur basharat (khushkhabri) dene wala hoon ek rasool ki jo mere baad aayega jiska naam Ahmed hoga. Magar jab woh unke paas khuli khuli nishaniyan lekar aaya to unhon ne kaha yeh to sareeh dhoka hai

Ab bhala us shaks se bada zaalim aur kaun hoga jo Allah par jhutey bohtan bandhey halaanke usey Islam (Allah ke aagey sar-e-itaat jhuka deney) ki dawat di ja rahi ho? Aisey zaalimon ko Allah hidayat nahin diya karta
Yeh log apni mooh ki phoonkon (blows) se Allah ke noor ko bujhana chahte hain, Aur Allah ka faisla yeh hai ke wo apne noor ko poora phayla kar rahega khwa kaafiron ko yeh kitna hi nagawar ho
Wahi to hai jisne apne Rasool ko hidayat aur deen-e-haqq ke saath bheja hai taa-ke usey poorey ke poorey deen par ghalib karde khwa mushrikeen ko yeh kitna hi nagawar ho
Aey logon jo iman laye ho, main bataoon tumko wo tijarat jo tumhein azaab-e-aleem se bacha de
Iman lao Allah aur uske Rasool par, Aur jihad karo Allah ki raah mein apne maalon se aur apni jaano se, yahi tumhare liye behtar hai agar tum jaano

Allah tumhare gunaah maaf kardega, aur tumko aisey baaghon mein daakhil karega jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi, aur abadi (eternal) qayaam ki jannaton mein behtareen ghar tumhein ata farmaeyga. Yeh hai badi kamiyabi
Aur woh dusri cheez jo tum chahte ho woh bhi tumhein dega, Allah ki taraf se nusrat (victory) aur kareeb hi mein hasil ho janey wali fatah. Aey Nabi ehle iman ko iski basharat de do

Aey logon jo iman laye ho, Allah ke madadgaar bano , jis tarah Isa ibn-e-Maryam ne hawariyon (disciples) ko khitaab karke kaha tha “Kaun hai Allah ki taraf (bulane) mein mera madadgaar”. Aur hawariyon (disciples) ne jawab diya tha : “hum hai Allah ke madadgaar”. Us waqt bani Israel ka ek giroh iman laya aur dusre giroh ne inkar kiya. Phir humne iman laney walon ki unke dushmano ke muqable mein taeed ki (aided) aur wahi ghalib hokar rahey
Allah ki tasbeeh kar rahi hai har woh cheez jo aasmano mein hai aur har wo cheez jo zameen mein hai, baadshah hai,Quddus(holy) hai,Zabardast aur Hakeem(wise) hai

Wahi hai jisne ummiyon (gentiles/unlettered) ke andar ek Rasool khud unhi mein se uthaya, jo unhein uski ayaat sunata hai, unki zindagi sanwarta hai,aur unko kitaab aur hikmat ki taleem deta hai, halaanke issey pehle woh khuli gumraahi me padey huey thay
Aur (is Rasool ki beasat) un dusre logon ke liye bhi hai jo abhi unse nahi miley hain
Allah Zabardast aur Hakeem hai yeh uska fazal hai jisey chahta hai deta ha. Aur woh bada fazal farmane wala hai

Jin logon ko Taurat ka hamil (charge) banaya gaya tha magar unhon ne uska baar na uthaya, unki misaal us gadhey(donkey) ki si hai jispar kitaabein laadi hui hon. Issey bhi zyada buri misaal hai un logon ki jinhon ne Allah ki ayaat ko jhutla diya hai. Aisey zaalimon ko Allah hidayat nahi diya karta

Insey kaho, “aey logo jo yahudi ban gaye ho, agar tumhein yeh ghamand (arrogance) hai ke baqi sab logon ko chodh kar bas tum hi Allah ke chahite (favourites) ho to maut ki tamanna karo agar tum apne is zaam (claim) mein sachche ho
lekin yeh hargiz iski tamanna na karenge apne kartooton ki wajah se jo ye kar chuke hain. Aur Allah in zalimon ko khoob jaanta hai

Insey kaho , “jis maut se tum bhaagte ho wo to tumhein aakar rahegi. Phir tum uske saamne pesh kiye jaogey jo poshida (hidden) aur zaahir ka jaanne wala hai. Aur woh tumhein bata dega ke tum kya kuch karte rahey ho
Aey logon jo iman laye ho, jab pukara jaye namaz ke liye jumaa ke din to Allah ke zikr ki taraf daudo aur khareed-o-farokht chodh do. Yeh tumhare liye zyada bethar hai agar tum jaano
Phir jab namaz poori ho jaye to zameen mein phayl jao aur Allah ka fazl talash karo aur Allah ko kasrat se yaad karte raho, shayad ke tumhein falaah (kamiyabi/prosperity) naseeb ho jaye

Aur jab unhon ne tijarat (business) aur khel tamasha hote dekha to uski taraf lapak gaye aur tumhein khada chodh diya. Insey kaho, jo kuch Allah ke paas hai wo khel tamashey aur tijarat se behtar hai aur Allah sabse behtar rizq (sustenance) dene wala hai

Aey Nabi, jab yeh munafiq (hypocrites) tumhare paas aate hain to kehte hain “hum gawahi dete hain ke aap yaqeenan Allah ke Rasool hain, “haan, Allah janta hai ke tum zaroor uske Rasool ho, magar Allah gawahi deta hai ke yeh munafiq qataii jhootey hain
Inhon ne apni kasamo ko dhaal bana rakkha hai aur is tarah yeh Allah ke raste se khud rukte aur duniya ko roakte hain. Kaisi buri harkatein hain jo yeh log kar rahey hain
Yeh sab kuch is wajah se hai ke in logon ne Imaan la kar phir kufr kiya is liye inke dilon par mohar laga di gayi, ab yeh kuch nahin samajhte

Inhein dekho to inke jussey(jism/bodies) tumhein badey shaandaar nazar aayein bolein to tum inki batein sunte reh jao, magar asal mein yeh goya lakhdi ke kunde hain(beams of timber) jo deewar ke saath chun kar rakh diye gaye hon. Har zoar ki aawaz ko yeh apne khilaf samajhte hain. Yeh pakke dushman hain insey bachh kar raho. Allah ki maar inpar yeh kidhar ultey phiraye ja rahe hain
Aur jab inse kaha jata hai ke aao taa-ke Allah ka Rasool tumhare liye magfirat ki dua karey, To sar jhatakte hain aur tum dekhte ho ke woh bade ghamand ke saath aane se rukte hai
Aey Nabi, tum chahe inke liye magfirat ki dua karo ya na karo, inke liye yaksan hai , Allah hargiz inhein maaf nahin karega. Allah faasik logon(transgressing folk) ko hargiz hidayat nahin deta

Yeh wahi log hain jo kehte hain ke Rasool ke saathiyon par kharch karna bandh kardo taa-ke yeh muntashir ho jayein. Halaanke zameen aur aasmaano ke khazano ka maalik Allah hi hai, magar yeh munafik samajhte nahin hain

Yeh kehte hain ke hum medina wapas pahunch jayein to jo izzat wala hai woh zaleel ko wahan se nikal bahar karega. Halaanke izzat to Allah aur uske Rasool aur momineen ke liye hai, magar yeh munafiq jante nahin hain
Aey logon jo imaan laye ho , tumhare maal aur tumhari auladein tumko Allah ki yaad se gaafil na kardein. Jo log aisa karein wahi khasare (nuqsan /loss) mein rehne waley hain

Jo rizq humne tumhein diya hai usmein se kharch karo qabl iske ke tum mein se kisi ki maut ka waqt aa jaye aur us waqt woh kahey "Aey mere Rubb, kyun na tu nay mujhey thodi si mahulat aur de di ke main sadaqa deta aur saleh logon mein shamil ho jata”
Halanke jab kisi ki mahulat-e-amal puri hone ka waqt aa jata hai to Allah us ko hargiz mazeed mahulat nahin deta, aur jo kuch tum karte ho, Allah usse bakhabar hai
Allah ki tasbeeh kar rahi hai har woh cheez jo aasmano mein hai aur har woh cheez jo zameen mein hai usi ki baadshahi hai aur usi ke liye tareef hai aur woh har cheez par qadir hai
Wahi hai jisne tumko paida kiya, phir tum mein se koi kafir hai aur koi momin. Aur Allah woh sab kuch dekh raha hai jo tum karte ho
Usne zameen aur aasmano ko barhaqq paida kiya hai, aur tumhari surat banayi aur badi umdah (excellent) banayi hai, aur usi ki taraf aakhir-e-kaar tumhein palatna hai
Zameen aur aasmano ki har cheez ka usey ilm hai jo kuch tum chupatey ho aur jo kuch tum zaahir karte ho sab us ko maloom hai. Aur woh dilon ka haal tak jaanta hai
kya tumhein un logon ki koi khabar nahi pahunchi jinhon ne issey pehle kufar kiya aur phir apni shamat-e-aamaal (evil consequence) ka maza chakkh liya? aur aagey unke liye ek dardnaak azaab hai

Is anjaam ke mustahiq woh is liye huey ke unke paas unke Rasool khuli khuli daleelein (clear signs) aur nishaniyan lekar aate rahey, magar unhon ne kaha" kya Insan humein hadayat deinge ?" Is tarah unhon ne maanne se inkaar kardiya aur mooh pheir liya. Tab Allah bhi unsey be-parwa ho gaya aur Allah to hai hi be niyaz aur apni zaat mein aap Mahmood (Praiseworthy)

Munkireen ne badey dawey se kaha hai ke woh marne ke baad hargiz dobara na uthaye jayenge. Insey kaho" nahin, mere Rubb ki kasam tum zaroor uthaye jaogey, phir zaroor tumhein bataya jayega ke tumne (duniya mein) kya kuch kiya hai aur aisa karna Allah ke liye bahut aasaan hai
Pas iman lao Allah par, aur uske Rasool par, aur us roshni par jo humne nazil ki hai. Jo kuch tum karte ho Allah usse bakhabar hai

(Iska pata tumhein us roz chal jayega ) jab ijtima (will assemble you )ke din woh tum sabko ikattha karega. Woh din hoga ek dusre ke muqable mein logon ki haar jeet ka. Jo Allah par iman laya hai aur neik amal karta hai, Allah uske gunah jhaad dega aur usey aisi jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi. Yeh log hamesha hamesha inmein rahenge. Yahi badi kamiyabi hai
Aur jin logon ne kufr kiya hai aur hamari aayaat ko jhutlaya hai woh dozakh ke bashindey(inmates ) honge, jismein woh hamesha rahenge. Aur woh badhtareen thikana hai
Koi museebat kabhi nahi aati magar Allah ke izan(Allah’s leave) hi se aati hai. Jo shakhs Allah par iman rakhta ho Allah uske dil ko hidayat bakshta hai. Aur Allah ko har cheez ka ilm hai
Allah ki itaat karo aur Rasool ki itaat karo lekin agar tum itaat se mooh moadtey ho to hamarey Rasool par saaf saaf haqq pahuncha dene ke siwa koi zimmedari nahin hai
Allah woh hai jiske siwa koi khuda nahin, lihaza iman laney walon ko Allah hi par bharosa rakhna chahiye

Aey logon jo iman laye ho, tumhari biwiyon aur tumhari aulad mein se baaz tumhare dushman hain, Inse hoshiyar raho. Aur agar tum Affu-o-darguzar(forgive and overlook) se kaam lo aur maaf kardo to Allah gafoor-o-Raheem hai
Tumhare maal aur tumhari aulad to ek aazmaish hai, aur Allah hi hai jiske paas bada ajar hai

lihaza jahan tak tumhare bas mein ho Allah se darte raho, aur suno aur itaat karo, aur apne maal kharch karo, yeh tumhare hi liye behtar hai. Jo apne dil ki tanggi se mehfooz reh gaye bas wahi falaah paney waley hain
Agar tum Allah ko qarz-e-hasan do to woh tumhein kai guna (several fold) badha kar dega aur tumhare kasooron se dar guzar farmayega. Allah bada qadardaan aur burdbar (Most Forbearing) hai
Haazir aur gayab har cheez ko jaanta hai, zabardast (mighty) aur daana(Most Wise) hai

Aey Nabi, jab tumlog auraton ko talaq do to unhein unki iddat (waiting-period) ke liye talaq diya karo aur iddat ke zamane ka theek theek shumar karo, aur Allah se daro jo tumhara Rubb hai (zamana-e-iddat mein) na tum unhein unke gharon se nikalo aur na woh khud nikle, illa yeh ke woh kisi sareeh burayi ki murtakib ho(manifestly evil deed). Yeh Allah ki muqarrar karda hadein hain, aur jo koi Allah ki hadon (bounds/limits) se tajauz karega woh apne upar khud zulm karega. Tum nahin jaante shayad iske baad Allah (muwafikat/reconciliation ki) koi surat paida karde

Phir jab woh apni (iddat ki) muddat ke khaatmay par pahunchey to ya unhein bhale tarike se (apne nikah mein ) rok rakkho , ya bhale tarike par unse juda ho jao, aur do aisey aadmiyon ko gawah bana lo jo tum mein se sahib-e-adal hon, aur (aey gawah banne walon)gawahi theek theek Allah ke liye ada karo. Yeh baatein hain jinki tum logon ko nasihat ki jati hai, har us shaks ko jo Allah aur aakhirat ke din par iman rakhta ho. Jo koi Allah se darte huey kaam karega Allah uske liye mushkilat se nikalne ka koi rasta paida kardega

Aur usey aise raaste se rizq dega jidhar uska guman(imagination) bhi na jata ho. Jo Allah par bharosa karey uske liye woh kafi hai. Allah apna kaam pura karke rehta hai, Allah ne har cheez ke liye ek taqdeer muqarrar kar rakkhi hai

Aur tumhari auraton mein se jo haiz(menstruation) se mayous ho chuki hon unke maamle mein agar tum logon ko koi shak lahik hai to ( tumhe maloom ho ke ) unki iddat teen mahiney hai aur yahi hukum unka hai jinhein abhi haiz na aaya ho.Aur haamila(pregnant) aurton ki iddat ki hadd yeh hai ke unka waze hamal(delivery) ho jaye. Jo shakhs Allah se darey uske maamle mein woh sahulat paida kar deta hai
Yeh Allah ka hukum hai jo usne tumhari taraf nazil kiya hai. Jo Allah se darega Allah uski buraiyon ko ussey door kardega aur usko bada ajar dega

Unko ( zamana-e-iddat mein ) usi jagah rakkho jahan tum rehtey ho, jaisi kuch bhi jagah tumhe muyassar ho, aur unhein tangg karne ke liye unko na satao. Aur agar woh haamila hon to unpar us waqt tak kharch karte raho jab tak unka waze hamal(delivered their burden) na ho jaye. Phir agar woh tumhare liye ( bachhey ko ) doodh pilayein to unki ujrat(recompense) unhein do, aur bhaley tareeqe se ( ujrat ka maamla) bahami guft-o-shaneed se tai karlo. Lekin agar tumne ( ujrat tai karne mein) ek dusrey ko tangg kiya to bachhey ko koi aur aurat doodh pila legi

Khushaal aadmi apni khushaali ke mutabiq nafqa de, aur jisko rizq kam diya gaya ho woh usi maal mein se kharch karey jo Allah ne usey diya hai. Allah ne jisko jitna kuch diya hai ussey ziyada ka woh usey mukallaf(burden) nahi karta. Baeed(door) nahin ke Allah tangdasti ke baad farakh dasti bhi ataa farmade
Kitni hi bastiyan hain jinhon ne apne Rubb aur uske Rasoolon ke hukum se sartabi (rebel) ki to humne unsey sakht muhasiba kiya aur unko buri tarhaan saza di
Unhon ne apne kiya ka maza chakkh liya aur unka anjaam-e-kaar ghaata hi ghaata(utter loss) hai
Allah ne ( aakhirat mein ) unke liye sakht azaab muhaiyya kar rakha hai. Pas Allah se daro aey sahib-e-aqal logon jo imaan laaye ho. Allah ne tumhari taraf ek naseehat nazil kardi hai

Ek aisa rasool jo tumko Allah ki saaf saaf hadaayat deney wali aayaat sunataa hai taa-ke imaan laane walon aur neik amal karne walon ko tarikiyon (darkness) se nikaal kar roshni mein le aaye. Jo koi Allah par imaan laaye aur neik amal karey Allah usey aisi jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi. Yeh log inmein hamesha hamesha rahenge. Allah ne aisey shakhs ke liye behtareen rizq rakkha hai

Allah woh hai jisne saat(seven) aasman banaye aur zameen ki qisam se bhi unhi ke manind (like them). Unke darmiyan hukum nazil hota rehta hai. (yeh baat tumhein isliye batayi jaa rahi hai ) taakey tum jaan lo ke Allah har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai, aur yeh ke Allah ka ilm har cheez par muheet (encompassing) hai
Aey Nabi, Tum kyun us cheez ko haraam karte ho jo Allah ne tumhare liye halal ki hai? (kya is liye ke) tum apni biwiyon ki khushi chahte ho? Allah maaf karne wala aur Reham farmane wala hai
Allah ne tum logon ke liye apni kasamo ki pabandi se nikalne ka tareeqa mukarrar kardiya hai Allah tumhara maula(guardian) hai aur wahi Aleem-o-Hakeem(All-Knowing, Most Wise) hai

(Aur yeh maamla bhi kaabil-e-tawajjuh hai ke ) Nabi ne ek baat apni ek biwi se raaz mein kahi thi phir jab us biwi ne (kisi aur par) woh raaz zahir kardiya, aur Allah ne Nabi ko is (ifshaey raaz) ki ittila de di , to Nabi ne uspar kisi hadd tak (us biwi ko) khabardar kiya aur kisi hadd tak ussey dar-guzar kiya. Phir jab Nabi ne usey (ifshaey raaz ki ) yeh baat batayi to usne pucha aapko iski kisne khabar di? Nabi ne kaha “Mujhey usne khabar di jo sab kuch janta hai aur khoob bakhabar hai”

Agar tum dono Allah se tauba karti ho (to yeh tumhare liye behtar hai) kyunke tumhare dil seedhi raah se hath gaye hain, aur agar Nabi ke muqable mein tumne baham jattah-bandi ki (support one another) to jaan rakkho ke Allah uska maula(Protector) hai aur uske baad Jibrael aur tammam saaleh ehle iman aur sab malaika uske saathi aur madadgaar hai

Baeed (door) nahin ke agar Nabi tum sab biwiyon ko talaq dede to Allah usey aisi biwiyan tumhare badle mein ata farma de jo tumse behtar hon, sacchi musalman ,ba-iman, itaat guzar , tauba guzar, ibadat guzar, aur rozedar, khwa shohar deedha ho ya bakira (both previously wedded ones and virgins)

Aey logon jo iman laye ho , bachao apne aap ko aur apne ehal-o-ayal ko (yourselves and your kindred) us aag se jis ka indhan (fuel) insaan aur patthar hongey, jispar nihayat tundh-khu (fierce) aur sakht-gir (stern) farishtey mukarrar hongey jo kabhi Allah ke hukum ki na farmani nahin karte aur jo hukm bhi unhein diya jata hai usey baja latey hain
(Us waqt kaha jayega ke) aey kafiron aaj maazratein (excuses) pesh na karo, tumhein to waisa hi badla diya ja raha hai jaise tum amal kar rahey thay

Aey logon jo iman laye ho, Allah se tauba karo, khalis tauba, baeed (door) nahin ke Allah tumhari buraiyan tumse dur karde aur tumhein aisi jannaton mein daakhil farmade jinke nichey nehrein beh rahi hongi, yeh woh din hoga jab Allah apne Nabi ko aur un logon ko jo uske saath iman laye hain ruswa na karega, unka noor unke aagey aagey aur unke dayein (right) jaanib daud raha hoga aur woh keh rahey hongey ke aey hamare Rubb, hamara noor hamare liye mukammal karde aur humse darguzar farma , tu har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai
Aey Nabi , kuffar aur munafikeen se jihad karo aur unke saath sakhti se pesh aao, unka thikana jahannum hai aur wo bahut bura thikana hai

Allah kafiron ke maamle mein Nooh aur Lut ki biwiyon ko bataur-e-misal pesh karta hai, woh hamare do saleh bando ki zaujiyat (marriage/wedlock) mein thi, magar unhon ne apne in shoharon se khayanat (treachery) ki aur woh Allah ke muqable mein unke kuch bhi na kaam aa sakey. Dono se kehdiya gaya ke jao aag mein janey walon ke saath tum bhi chali jao

Aur ehle iman ke maamle mein Allah Firoun ki biwi ki misal pesh karta hai jabke usne dua ki “Aey mere Rubb,mere liye apne haan jannat mein ek ghar bana de aur mujhey Firoun aur iske amal se bacha le aur zalim qaum se mujhko nijaat de.”

Aur Imran ki beti Maryam ki misaal deta hai jisne apni sharmgaah ki hifazat ki thi, phir humne uske andar apni taraf se rooh phoonk di aur usne apne Rubb ke irshadaat aur uski kitabon ki tasdeeq ki aur woh itaat guzar (obedient) logon mein se thi
Nihayat buzurg-o-bartar hai woh jiske haath mein qayinaat ki sultanat hai , aur woh har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai
Jisne maut aur zindagi ko ijaat kiya taa-ke tum logon ko aazma kar dekhey tum mein se kaun behtar amal karne wala hai, aur woh zabardast bhi hai aur darguzar farmane wala bhi
Jisne teh-bar-teh saat (seven) aasman banaye tum Rehman ki takhleeq(creation) mein kisi kism ki be-rabti (incongruity) na paogey phir palat kar dekho, kahin tumhein koi khalal (flaw) nazar aata hai
Baar baar nigaah daudao tumhari nigaah thak kar na-murad palat aayegi

Humne tumhare kareeb ke aasman ko azeem-o-shaan chiragon se aarasta (adorned /beautify) kiya hai aur unhein shayateen ko maar bhagane ka zariya bana diya hai. In shaytano ke liye bhadakti hui aag humne muhayya kar rakkhi hai
Jin logon ne apne Rubb se kufr kiya hai unke liye jahannum ka azaab hai aur woh bahut hi bura thikana hai
Jab woh usmein phenke jayenge to uske dhahadne (roar) ki haulnaak aawaz sunengey aur woh josh kha rahi hogi

Shiddat-e-gazab se phati jati hogi, har baar jab koi anbwah (multitude/group) us mein dala jayega uske kaarinde (keepers) un logon se puchenge “kya tumhare paas koi khabardaar karne wala nahin aaya tha?”
Woh jawab denge “haan ,khabardaar karne wala hamare paas aaya tha,magar humne usey jhutla diya aur kaha Allah ne kuch bhi nazil nahin kiya hai, tum badi gumraahi mein padey huey ho”
Aur woh kahenge “kaash hum sunte ya samajhte to aaj is bhadakti hui aag ke sazawaron mein na shamil hotey”
Is tarah woh apne kasoor ka khud aitraaf (confess) kar lengey, laanat hai in dozakhiyon par
Jo log be-dekhe apne Rubb se darte hai , yaqeenan unke liye magfirat hai aur bada ajar
Tum khwah chupke se baat karo ya unchi aawaz se (Allah ke liye yaksa hai) woh to dilon ka haal tak jaanta hai
Kya wahi na jaanega jisne paida kiya hai? Halanke woh baareek-been aur bakhabar hai
Wahi to hai jisne tumhare liye zameen ko taabeh kar rakkha hai , chalo uski chaati par aur khao khuda ka rizq, usi ke huzoor tumhein dobara zinda ho kar jana hai
Kya tum issey be-khauf ho ke woh jo aasman mein hai tumhein zameen mein dhasa de aur yakayak yeh zameen jhakoley khane lagey (shake/rock violently)
Kya tum issey be-khauf ho ke wo jo aasman mein hai tum par pathrao karne wali hawa bhej de? Phir tumhein maloom ho jayega ke meri tambeeh (warning) kaisi hoti hai
Inse pehle guzre huey log jhutla chuke hain phir dekhlo ke meri giraft kaisi sakht thi
Kya yeh log apne upar udney waley parindon ko par phaylaye aur sukedte nahin dekhte? Rehman ke siwa koi nahin jo inhein thamey huey ho. Wahi har cheez ka nigehbaan hai
Batao, aakhir woh kaunsa lashkar tumhare paas hai jo Rehman ke muqable mein tumhari madad kar sakta hai? Haqeeqat yeh hai ke yeh mukireen dhoke mein padey huey hain
Ya phir batao, kaun hai jo tumhein rizq de sakta hai agar Rehman apna rizq roak ley? Dar-asal yeh log sarkashi aur haqq se gurez par adey huey hai
Bhala socho, jo shaks mooh aundhaey (grovelling) chal raha ho woh zyada sahih raah paney wala hai ya woh jo sar uthaye seedha ek hamwar sadak par chal raha ho
Inse kaho Allah hi hai jisne tumhein paida kiya, tumko sunney aur dekhne ki taaqatein di aur sochne samajhne waley dil diye, magar tum kam hi shukr ada karte ho
Insey kaho, Allah hi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein phailaya hai aur usi ki taraf tum sametey jaogey
Yeh kehte hain “Agar tum sacchey ho to batao yeh wada kab poora hoga?”
Kaho “Iska ilm to Allah ke paas hai, main to bas saaf saaf khabardar kardene wala hoon

Phir jab yeh us cheez ko kareeb dekh lenge to un sab logon ke chehre bigad jayenge jinhon ne inkar kiya hai, aur us waqt unse kaha jayega ke yahi hai woh cheez jiske liye tum takazey kar rahey (ask for) thay
Insey kaho, kabhi tumne yeh bhi socha ke Allah khwa mujhey aur mere saathiyon ko halaaq karde ya hum par Reham karey, kafiron ko dardnaak azaab se kaun bacha lega
Insey kaho, woh bada Raheem hai, usi par hum imaan laye hain, aur usi par hamara bharosa hai, ankareeb tumhein maloom ho jayega ke sareeh gumrahi (manifest error) mein pada hua kaun hai
Inse kaho, kabhi tumne yeh bhi socha ke agar tumhare kuwon (wells) ka pani zameen mein utar jaye to kaun hai jo is pani ki behti hui sotein (flowing water) tumhein nikal kar la dega
Noon, Kasam hai qalam ki aur us cheez ki jisey likhne waley likh rahey hain
Tum apne Rubb ke fazl se majnoon (deewane) nahin ho
Aur yaqeenan tumhare liye aisa ajar (reward) hai jiska silsila kabhi khatm honay wala nahin
Aur beshak tum akhlaaq ke bade martabe par ho
Anqareeb tum bhi dekh logey aur woh bhi dekh lenge
Ke tum mein se kaun junoon (madness) mein mubtala hai
Tumhara Rubb un logon ko bhi khoob jaanta hai jo uski raah se bhatkey huey hain , aur wahi unko bhi acchi tarah jaanta hai jo raah-e-raast par hai
Lihaza tum in jhutlane walon ke dabao mein hargiz na aao
yeh to chahte hain ke kuch tum mudahnat (narmi) karo to yeh bhi mudahnat (narmi) karein
Hargiz na dabo kisi aisey shaks se jo bahut kasmein khane wala be-waqaat (worthless) aadmi hai
Taaney deta hai , chugliyan khata phirta hai (slanderer, gossip-monger)
Bhalayi se rokta hai , zulm-o-zyadti mein hadd se guzar janey wala hai, sakht badh-amal hai , jafa-kaar hai
Aur in sab uyub (aib) ke saath badh-asl (illegitimate child) hai
Is bina par ke woh bahut maal-o-aulad rakhta hai
Jab hamari aayat usko sunayi jati hai to kehta hai yeh to agle waqton ke afsane hain
Ankareeb hum iski sund (snout) par daag lagayenge

Humne in (ehle makkah) ko usi taraah aazmaish mein dala hai jis tarah ek baagh (garden) ke maalikon ko aazmaish mein dala tha, jab unhon ne kasam khayi ke subah sawerey zaroor apne baagh ke phal todenge
Aur woh koi istasna (exception) nahin kar rahey thay
Raat ko woh soye padey thay ke tumhare Rubb ki taraf se ek balaa is baagh par phir gayi
Aur uska haal aisa ho gaya jaise kati hui fasal ho
Subah un logon ne ek dusre ko pukara
Kaha agar phal todne hai ho to sawerey sawerey apni kheti ki taraf nikal chalo
Chunanchey woh chal padey aur aapas mein chupke chupke kehte jatay thay
Ke aaj koi miskeen tumhare paas baag mein na aane paye
Woh kuch na dene ka faisla kiye huye subah sawerey jaldi jaldi is tarah wahan gaye jaise ke woh (phal todne par) qadir hain
Magar jab baagh ko dekha to kehne lagey “hum raasta bhool gaye hain
Nahin balke hum mehroom reh gaye”
Un mein jo sab se behtar aadmi tha usne kaha “maine tumse kaha na tha ke tum tasbeeh kyun nahin karte?”
Woh pukar utthey paak hai hamara Rubb, waqayi hum gunahgaar thay
Phir unmein se har ek dusre ko malamat karne laga
Akhir ko unhon ne kaha “afsos hamare haal par, beshak hum sarkash ho gaye thay
Baeed (door) nahin ke hamara Rubb humein badle mein issey behtar baagh ata farmaye, hum apne Rubb ki taraf rujoo karte hain
Aisa hota hai azaab aur aakhirat ka azaab issey bhi bada hai, kaash yeh log isko jaante
Yaqeenan khuda-tars logon ke liye unke Rubb ke yahan niyamat bhari jannatein hain
Kya hum farma-bardaaron ka haal mujreemon sa kardein
Tum logon ko kya ho gaya hai, tum kaise hukum lagate ho
Kya tumhare paas koi kitaab hai jismein tum yeh padhte ho
Ke tumhare liye zaroor wahan wahi kuch hai jo tum apne liye pasand karte ho
Ya phir kya tumhare liye roz-e-qayamat tak humpar kuch ahad-o-paiman (covenant) sabit hai ke tumhein wahi kuch milega jiska tum hukum lagao
Inse pucho tum mein se kaun iska zaamin (gurantee/responsible) hai
Ya phir inke thehraye huye kuch sahreek hain (jinhon ne iska zimma liya ho)?yeh baat hai to layein apne shareekon ko agar yeh sacchey hain
Jis roz sakht waqt aa padega aur logon ko sajda karne ke liye bulaya jayega to yeh log sajda na kar sakenge
Inki nigaahein nichey hongi, zillat inpar chaa rahi hogi. Yeh jab sahi-o-saalim thay us waqt inhein sajde ke liye (bulaya jata tha) aur yeh inkar karte thay
Pas aey Nabi, tum is kalam ke jhutlane walon ka maamla mujhpar chodh do hum aise tarike se inko batadreej tabahi ki taraf le jayenge ke inko khabar bhi na hogi
Main inki rassi daraaz kar raha hoon, meri chaal badi zabardast hai
Kya tum insey koi ajar (compensation) talab kar rahey ho ke yeh is chatti ke bojh (feel burdened with debt) taley dabey ja rahe hoon
Kya inke paas gaib ka ilam hai jisey yeh likh rahey hon
Pas apne Rubb ka faisla saadir honay tak sabr karo aur machli wale (younis) ki tarah na ho jao, jab usne pukara tha aur woh gham se bhara hua tha
Agar uske Rubb ki meharbani uske shamil-e-haal na ho jati to woh mazmoom (disgrace) hokar chatyal maidan mein phenk diya jata
Aakhir-e-kaar uske Rubb ne usey barguzida (exalted) farma liya aur usey saleh bandon mein shamil kardiya
Jab yeh kafir log kalam-e-nasihat (Quran) sunte hain to tumhein aisi nazaron se dekhte hain ke goya tumhare qadam ukhaad denge, Aur kehte hain ke yeh zaroor deewana hai
Halaanke yeh to sarey jahaan walon ke liye ek naseehat hai
Honi shudhni ! (indubitable) [sach-much honay wali]
Kya hai woh honi shudni (indubitable)
Aur tum kya jaano ke woh kya hai honi shudhni (indubitable)
Samood aur Aad ne us achanak toot padne wali aafat ko jhutlaya
To Samood ek sakht haadse mein halaaq kiye gaye
Aur Aad ek badi shadeed toofani aandhi(storm) se tabah kardiye gaye

Allah taala ne usko musalsal saat (seven) raat aur aath (eight) din unpar musallat rakkha (tum wahan hotey to) dekhte ke woh wahan is tarah pachade paday jaise woh khajoor ke boseeda (rotten) taney (trunks) hon
Ab kya unmein se koi tumhein baki nazar aata hai
Aur isi khata-e-azeem ka irtiqaab Firoun aur ussey pehle ke logon ne aur talpat (overturned) ho janey wali bastiyon ne kiya
Un sab ne apne Rubb ke Rasool ki baat na maani to usne unko bade sakhti ke saath pakda
Jab pani ka toofan hadd se guzar gaya to humne tumko kashti mein sawar kardiya tha
Taa-ke is waqiye ko tumhare liye ek sabaq-aamoz yaadgaar bana dein aur yaad rakhne waley kaan iski yaad mehfooz rakkhein
Phir jab ek dafa sur mein phoonk maar di jayegi
Aur zameen aur pahadon ko utha kar ek hi chot mein reza reza kardiya jayega
Us roz woh honay wala waqiya pesh aa jayega
Usdin Aasmaan phatega aur uski bandish dhili padh jayegi
Farishtey uske atraf-o-jawanib mein hongey aur aat (eight) farishtey us roz tere Rubb ka arsh apne upar uthaye huey hongey
Woh din hoga jab tumlog pesh kiye jaogey, tumhara koi raaz bhi chupa na reh jayega
Us waqt jiska naam-e-aamal uske seedhey haath mein diya jayega woh kahega “lo dekho, padho mera naam-e-aamal
Main samajhta tha ke mujhey zaroor apna hisaab milne wala hai”
Pas woh dil pasand aish mein hoga
Aali muqaam jannat mein
Jiske phalon ke guchhey jhuke padh rahey hongey
(Aise logon se kaha jayega) mazey se khao aur pio apne un aamal ke badle jo tumne guzre huey dino mein kiye hain
Aur jiska naam-e-aamal uske bayein (left) haath mein diya jayega woh kahega “ kaash mera aamal nama mujhey na diya gaya hota
Aur main na jaanta ke mera hisaab kya hai
Kaash meri wahi maut (jo duniya mei aayi thi) faisla-kun hoti
Aaj mera maal mere kuch kaam na aaya
Mera sara iqtedaar khatam ho gaya
(hukum hoga) pakdo isey aur iski gardan mei touk daal do
Phir isey jahannum mein jhoonk do
Phir isko satter(seventy) haath lambi zanjeer mei jakad do
Yeh na Allah buzurg-o-bartar par iman lata tha
Aur na miskeen ko khana khilane ki targeeb deta tha
Lihaza aaj na yahan iska koi yaar-e-gamkhaar hai
Aur na zakhmon ke dhowan (washing of wounds) ke siwa iske liye koi khana
Jisey khatakaaron (sinners) ke siwa koi nahin khata
Pas nahin, main qasam khata hoon un cheezon ki bhi jo tum dekhte ho
Aur unki bhi jinhein tum nahin dekhte
Yeh ek Rasool-e-kareem ka qaul ( speech ) hai
Kisi shayar ka qaul nahin hai, tumlog kam hi iman latey ho
Aur na yeh kisi kaahin(soothsayer) ka qaul hai , tum log kam hi gaur karte ho
Yeh Rabb-ul alameen ki taraf se nazil huwa hai
Aur agar is (Nabi) ne khud ghad kar koi baat hamari taraf mansook ki hoti
To hum iska dayan(right) haath padkad letay
Aur iski rag-e-gardan (life vein) kaat daalte
Phir tum mein se koi (humein)is kaam se rokne wala na hota
Dar haqeeqat yeh parheizgar logon ke liye ek naseehat hai
Aur hum jante hain ke tum mein se kuch log jhutlane waley hain
Aise kafiron ke liye yaqeenan yeh mujeeb-e-hasrat (cause of regret) hai
Aur yeh bilkul yaqeeni haqq hai
Pas aey nabi, apne Rubb-e-azeem ke naam ki tasbeeh karo
Mangne waley ne azaab maanga hai (woh azaab) jo zaroor waqey honay wala hai
Kafiron ke liye hai, koi usey dafa karne wala nahin
Us khuda ki taraf se hai jo urooj ke zeeno (ascending steps)ka malik hai
Malaika (angels) aur rooh(Jibrael) uske huzoor chadh kar jatey hain ek aise din mein jiski miqdar pacchas (fifty) hazar saal hai
Pas aey Nabi, sabr karo, shaista sabr
Yeh log usey dur samajhte hain
Aur hum usey qareeb dekh rahey hain
(woh azaab us roz hoga) jis roz aasman pigli huye chandi ki tarah ho jayega
Aur pahad rang-bi-rang ke dhunke huey oon (wool) jaise ho jayenge
Aur koi jigri dost apne jigri dost ko na puchega
Halaanke woh ek dusre ko dikhaye jayenge, mujrim chahega ke us din ke azaab se bachne ke liye apni aulad ko
Apni biwi ko, apne bhai ko
Apne qareeb-tareen khandaan ko jo usey panaah dene wala tha
Aur rooh-e-zameen ke sab logon ko fidiya (badle) mein dey-de aur yeh tadbeer usey nijaat dila de
Hargiz nahin woh to bhadakti hui aag ki lapat hogi
Jo gosht posht ko chaat jayegi
Pukar pukar kar apni taraf bulayegi har us shaks ko jisne haqq se mooh moda aur peet pheri
Aur maal jamaa kiya aur seint seint kar (amassed wealth) rakkha
Insan thud-dila (impatient) paida kiya gaya hai
Jab uspar museebat aati hai to ghabra uthta hai
Aur jab usey khush-haali naseeb hoti hai to bukhl (kanjoosi) karne lagta hai
Magar woh log (is aib se bache huey hai) jo namaz padne waley hain
Jo apni namaz ki hamesha pabandi karte hai
Jinke maalon mein
Saahil (maangne waley) aur mehroom ka ek haqq mukarrar hai
Jo roz-e-jaza ko barhaq maante hain
Jo apne Rubb ke azaab se darte hain
Kyunke unke Rubb ka azaab aisi cheez nahin hai jissey koi bekhauf ho
Jo apni sharmgahon ki hifazat karte hain
Ba-juz apne biwiyon ya apni mamluka aurton ke jinse mehfooz na rakhne mein unpar koi malamat nahin
Albatta jo iske alawa kuch aur chahein wahi hadd se tajawuz karne wala hai
Jo apne amanaton ki hifazat aur apne ahad (covenant) ka paas karte hai
Jo apni gawahiyon mein raast baazi (upright) par qayam rehte hain
Aur jo apni namaz ki hifazat karte hain
Yeh log izzat ke saath jannat ke baaghon mei rahenge
Pas aey Nabi , kya baat hai ke yeh munkirin dayein(left) aur bayein(right) se
Giroh (crowds) dar giroh(crowds) tumhari taraf daude chale aa rahe hain
Kya inmein se har ek yeh lalaj rakhta hai ke woh niyamat bhari jannat mein daakhil kardiya jayega
Hargiz nahin humne jis cheez se inko paida kiya hai usey yeh khud jaante hain
Pas nahin, main qasam khata hoon mashrikon aur maghribon ke maalik ki hum ispar qadir hain
Ke inki jagah insey behtar log le aayein aur koi humse baazi le jaane wala nahin hai
Lihaza inhein apni behuda baaton aur apne khel mein pada rehne do yahan tak ke yeh apne us din ko pahunch jayenge jiska insey waada kiya ja raha hai
Jab yeh apni qabron se nikal kar is tarah daude ja rahey hongey jaise apne buthon (idols) ke aasthano (altars) ki taraf daud rahey hon
Inki nigahein jhuki hui hongi, zillat inpar chaa rahi hogi, woh din hai jiska insey wada kiya ja raha hai
Humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja (is hidayat ke saath) ke apni qaum ke logon ko khabardar karde qabl iske ke unpar ek dardnaak azaab aaye
Usne kaha “ Aey meri qaum ke logon, main tumhare liye ek saaf saaf khabardar kardene wala (paighambar) hoon
(Tumko aagah karta hoon) ke Allah ki bandagi karo aur ussey daro aur meri itaat (follow) karo

Allah tumhare gunaahon se darguzar farmayega aur tumhein ek waqt-e-mukarrar tak baaki rakkhega. Haqeeqat yeh hai ke Allah ka mukarrar kiya hua waqt jab aa jata hai to phir taala nahin jata kaash tumhein iska ilm ho
Usne arz kiya “Aey mere Rubb , maine apni qaum ke logon ko shab-o-roz (night and day) pukara
Magar meri pukar ne unke farar hi mei izafa kiya
Aur jab bhi maine unko bulaya taa-ke tu unhein maaf karde , unhon ne kaano mein ungliyan thoos li aur apne kapdon se mooh dhaank liye aur apni rawish par adh gaye aur bada takabbur (proudness) kiya
Phir maine unko haanke pukarey (openly) ki dawat di
Phir maine aelaniya (publicly) bhi unko tableeg ki aur chupke chupke bhi samjhaya
Maine kaha apne Rubb se maafi maango,beshak woh bada maaf karne wala hai
Woh tumpar aasmaan se khoob baarishein barsayega
Tumhein maal aur aulad se nawaze ga, tumhare liye baagh paida karega aur tumhare liye nehrein jaari kardega
Tumhein kya ho gaya hai ke Allah ke liye tum kisi waqar (majesty) ki tawakku nahin rakhte
Halaanke usne tarah tarah se tumhein banaya hai
Kya dekhte nahin ho ke Allah ne kis tarah saat aasman teh-bar-teh banaye
Aur unmein chand ko noor aur suraj ko chiraag banaya
Aur Allah ne tumko zameen se ajeeb tarah ugaya
Phir woh tumhein isi zameen mein wapas le jayega aur issey yakayak tumko nikal khada karega
Aur Allah ne zameen ko tumhare liye farsh ki tarah bicha diya
Taa-ke tum uske andar khule raaston mein chalo
Nooh ne kaha “mere Rubb, unhon ne meri baat radd kardi aur un (raheeson) ki pairvi ki jo maal aur aulad paa kar aur zyada na murad ho gaye hain
In logon ne bada bhaari makr (plot) ka jaal phaila rakkha hai
Inhon ne kaha hargiz na chodo apne maboodon (deities) ko, aur na chodo Wadd aur Suwa ko aur na Yagus aur Yaook aur Nasr ko (idol names)
Inhon ne bahut logon ko gumraah kiya hai, aur tu bhi in zalimon ko gumrahi ke siwa kisi cheez mein tarakki na de
Apni khataon ki bina par hi woh garq(drown) kiye gaye aur Aag mein jhoonk diye gaye , phir unhon ne apne liye Allah se bachane wala koi madadgar na paya
Aur Nooh ne kaha “Mere Rubb, In kafiron mein se koi zameen par basne wala na chodh
Agar tu ne inko chodh diya to yeh tere bandon ko gumraah karenge aur inki nasal se jo bhi paida hoga badkar aur sakht kafir hi hoga

Mere Rubb, mujhey aur mere waldain ko aur har us shaks ko jo mere ghar mein momin ki haisiyat se dakhil hua hai, Aur sab momin mardon aur auraton ko maaf farma de, Aur zalimon ke liye halakat ke siwa kisi cheez mein izafa na kar
Aey Nabi, kaho, meri taraf wahee (revelation) bheji gayi hai ke Jinno ke ek giroh (group) ne gaur se suna phir (jaa kar apne qaum ke logon se) kaha: “humne ek bada hi ajeeb Quran suna hai
Jo raah-e-raast ki taraf rehnumayi karta hai is liye hum uspar iman le aaye hain aur ab hum hargiz apne Rubb ke saath kisi ko sharik nahin karenge
Aur yeh ke hamare Rubb ki shaan bahut aala-o-Arfa hai , usne kisi ko biwi ya beta nahin banaya
Aur yeh ke hamare nadaan log Allah ke barey mein bahut khilaf-e-haqq baatein karte rahey hain
Aur yeh ke humne samjha tha ke insaan aur jinn kabhi khuda ke baarey mein jhoot nahin bol sakte
Aur yeh ke Insano mein se kuch log Jinno mein se kuch logon ki panaah (refuge) maanga karte thay, is tarah unhon ne Jinno ka guroor aur zyada badha diya
Aur yeh ke insaano ne bhi wahi gumaan kiya jaisa tumhara gumaan tha ke Allah kisi ko Rasool bana kar na bhejega
Aur yeh ke humne aasman ko tatola to dekha ke woh pehray-daaron (terrible guards) se patha pada hai aur shahabon (shooting meteors) ki baarish ho rahi hai

Aur yeh ke pehle hum sun-gun lene ke liye aasman mei baithnay ki jagah paa lete thay, magar ab jo chori chupey sunne ke koshish karta hai woh apne liye ghaat mein ek shahabe saaqib (shooting meteors) laga hua paata hai
Aur yeh ke hamari samajh mein na aata tha ke aaya zameen walon ke saath koi bura maamla karne ka irada kiya gaya hai ya unka Rubb unhein raah-e-raast dikhana chahta hai
Aur yeh ke hum mein se kuch log saleh (upright) hain aur kuch is se farotar hain, hum mukhtalif tareeqon (ways/factions) mein batey (divided) huey hain
Auy yeh ke hum samajhte thay ke na zameen mein hum Allah ko aajiz (frustrate) kar sakte hain aur na bhaag kar usey hara saktey hain
Aur yeh ke humne jab hidayat ki taleem suni to hum uspar iman le aaye ab jo koi bhi apne Rubb par iman le aayega usey kisi haq-talfi ya zulm ka khauff na hoga
Aur yeh ke hum mein se kuch muslim(Allah ke itaat guzar) hain aur kuch haqq se munharif (upright) to jinhon ne Islam (itaat ka raasta) ikhtiyar kar liya unhon ne najaat ki raah dhoond li
Aur jo haqq se muhnarif hai woh jahannum ka indhan (fuel) banney wala hai
Aur (aey Nabi kaho mujhpar yeh wahee bhi ki gayi hai ke) log agar raah-e-raast par sabit qadami (firmly) se chalte to hum unhein khoob sairaab karte (provide abundant rain)
Taa-ke is niyamat se unki aazmaish karein aur jo apne Rubb ke zikr se mooh modega uska Rubb usey sakht azaab mein mubtala kardega
Aur yeh ke masjidein Allah ke liye hai, lihaza unmein Allah ke saath kisi aur ko na pukaro
Aur yeh ke jab Allah ka banda usko pukarne ke liye khada hua to log uspar toot padne ke liye tayyar ho gaye
Aey Nabi ,kaho ke main to apne Rubb ko pukarta hoon aur uske saath kisi ko sharik nahin karta
Kaho main tum logon keliye na kisi nuksan ka ikhtiyar rakhta hoon na kisi bhalayi ka
Kaho mujhey Allah ki giraft se koi nahin bacha sakta aur na main uske daaman ke siwa koi jaye panaah (refuge) paa sakta hoon

Mera kaam iske siwa kuch nahin hai ke Allah ki baat aur uske paighamaat pahuncha doon. Ab jo bhi Allah aur uske Rasool ki baat na maanega uske liye jahannum ki aag hai aur aisey log usmein hamesha rahenge

(Yeh log apni is rawish se baaz na aayenge) yahan tak ke jab us cheez ko dekh lenge jiska inse waada kiya ja raha hai to inhein maloom ho jayega ke kiske madadgaar kamzoar hain aur kiska jattha (group) taadad mein kam hai
Kaho, main nahin jaanta ke jis cheez ka waada tumse kiya ja raha hai woh qareeb hai ya mera Rubb uske liye koi lambi muddat muqarrar famata hai
Woh aalimul gaib hai , apne gaib par kisi ko muttala (reveal/disclose) nahin karta
Siwai us Rasool ke jisey usne (gaib ka koi ilm dene ke liye) pasand karliya ho, to uske aagey aur pichey woh muhafiz (guards) laga deta hai
Taa-ke woh jaan le ke unhon ne apne Rubb ke paighamaat pahuncha diye, aur woh unke poorey maahol ka ihata (encompass) kiye huey hai aur ek ek cheez ko usne gin rakkha hai
Aey oad lapet kar (enwrapped ) sone waley
Raat ko namaz mein khade raha karo magar kam
Aadhi Raat
Ya issey kuch kam karlo ya issey kuch zyada badha do, aur Quran ko khoob tehar tehar kar padho
Hum tumpar ek bhari kalam nazil karne waley hain
Dar haqeeqat raat ka uthna nafs par qaabu paney ke liye bahut kaargar aur Quran theek padhne ke liye zyada mauzu (suitable) hai
Din ke auqat mein to tumhare liye bahut masrufiyat (prolonged occupation) hai
Apne Rubb ke naam ka zikr kiya karo aur sabse katt kar usi ke ho raho
Woo mashrik (east) o magrib (west) ka maalik hai, uske siwa koi khuda nahin hai, lihaza usi ko apna wakeel bana lo
Aur jo baatein log bana rahey hain unpar sabr karo aur sharafat ke saath unse alag ho jao
In jhutlane waley khush haal logon se nimatne ka kaam tum mujhpar chodh do aur inhein zara kuch dair isi halat par rehne do
Hamarey paas (inke liye) bhaari bediyan hain aur bhadakti hui aag
Aur halaq(throat) mein phasne wala khana aur dard-naak azaab
Yeh us din hoga jab zameen aur pahad laraz uthengey aur pahadon ka haal aisa ho jaeyga jaise reit (sand) ke dhair hai jo bhikhre ja rahe hain
Tum logon ke paas humne usi tarah ek rasool tum par gawah bana kar bheja hai jis tarah humne Firaun ki taraf ek rasool bheja tha
(Phir dekhlo ke jab ) Firaun ne us Rasool ki baat na maani to humne usko badi sakhti kay saath pakad liya
Agar tum maan-ne se inkar karoge to us din kaisey bach jaogey jo bacchon ko boodha kardega
Aur jiski sakhti se aasman phata ja raha hoga?Allah ka wada to poora hokar hi rehna hai
Yeh ek nasihat hai , ab jiska jee chahey apne Rubb ki taraf janey ka rasta ikhtiyar karle

Aey Nabi, tumhara Rubb janta hai ke tum kabhi do tihayi (two-third) raat ke qareeb aur kabhi aadhi raat aur kabhi ek tihayi (one-third) raat ibadat mein khade rehtey ho,Aur tumhare saathiyon mein se bhi ek giroh yeh amal karta hai, Allah hi raat aur din ke auqat ka hisab rakhta hai. Usey maloom hai ke tumlog auqat ka theek shumar nahin kar sakte, lihaza usne tumpar meharbani farmayi, Ab jitna Quran aasani se padh sakte ho padh liya karo. Usey maloom hai ke tum mein kuch mareez hongey, kuch dusre log Allah ke fazal(bounty) ki talash mein safar karte hain, Aur kuch aur log Allah ki raah mein jung karte hain, pas jitna Quran ba aasani padha ja sakey padh liya karo, namaz qayam karo, zakaat do aur Allah ko accha qarz dete raho, jo kuch bhalayi tum apne liye aagey bhejoge usey Allah ke yahan maujood paogey, wahi zyada behtar hai aur uska ajr bahut bada hai. Allah se magfirat maangte raho, beshak Allah bada Gafoor o Raheem hai
Aey oad lapeit (enveloped) kar laitney waley
Utho aur khabardar karo
Aur apne Rubb ki badayi ka elan karo
Aur apne kapde paak rakho
Aur gandagi se dur raho
Aur ehsan na karo zyada hasil karne keliye
Aur apne Rubb ki khatir sabr karo
Accha jab soor mein phook maari jayegi
Woh din bada hi sakht din hoga
Kafiron ke liye halka na hoga
Chodh do mujhey aur us shaks ko jisey maine akela paida kiya hai
Bahut sa maal usko diya
Uske saath hazir rehne waley bete diye
Aur uske liye riyasat ki raah hamwaar ki
Phir woh tama (greedily desire) rakhta hai ke main usey aur zyada doon
Hargiz nahin woh hamari ayaat se inaath(stubbornly oppose) rakhta hai
Main to usey ankareeb ek kathin chadhai chadwaunga
Usne socha aur kuch baat banane ki koshish ki
To khuda ki maar uspar, kaisi baat banane ki koshish ki
Haan, khuda ki maar uspar , kaisi baat banane ki koshish ki
Phir(logon ki taraf) dekha
Phir peshani sukedi aur mooh banaya
Phir palta aur takabbur mein padh gaya
Aakhir e kaar bola ke yeh kuch nahin hai magar ek jaadu jo pehle se chala aa raha hai
Yeh to ek Insani kalaam hai
Anqareeb main usey dozakh mei jhonk dunga
Aur tum kya jaano ke kya hai woh dozakh
Na baqi rakhey na chodey
Khaal(skin) jhulas dene wali
Unnis (ninteen) karkoon uspar muqarrar hain

Humne dozakh ke yeh karkoon farishtey banaye hain,aur unki tadaad ko kafiron ke liye fitna bana diya hai, taa-ke ehle kitaab ko yaqeen aa jaye aur iman laney walon ka iman badhey,Aur ehle kitaab aur momineen kisi shakk mein na rahey,aur dil ke bimar aur kuffar yeh kahein ke bhala Allah ka is ajeeb baat se kya matlab ho sakta hai. Is tarah Allah jisey chahta hai gumraah kardeta hai aur jisey chahta hai hidayat baksh deta hai aur tere Rubb ke lashkaron (soldiers) ko khud uske siwa koi nahin janta, aur is dozak ka zikr iske siwa kisi garz ke liye nahin kiya gaya hai ke logon ko issey naseehat ho
Hargiz nahin,kasam hai Chand ki
Aur Raat ki jabke woh palat-ti hai
Aur subah ki jabke woh roshan hoti hai
Yeh dozakh bhi badi cheezon mein se ek hai
Insano ke liye darawa
Tum mein se har us shaks ke liye darawa jo aagey badhna chahey ya pichey reh jana chahey
Har mutanaffis, apne kasb ke badle rehan hai (hostage to one’s deeds)
Dayein bazu walon ke siwa
Jo jannaton mein hongey, wahan woh
Mujrimon se puchenge
Tumhein kya cheez dozakh mein le gayi
woh kahenge “hum namaz padne walon mein se na thay
Aur miskeen ko khana nahin khilate thay
Aur haqq ke khilaf batein banane walon ke saath milkar hum bhi batein banane lagte thay
Aur roz-e-jaza ko jhoot karar dete thay
Yahan tak ke humein us yaqeeni cheez se saabqa pesh aa gaya”
Us waqt sifarish karne walon ki sifarish unke kisi kaam na ayegi
Aakhir in logon ko kya ho gaya hai ke yeh is nasihat se mooh moad rahey hain
Goya yeh jungli gadhey hain
Jo Sher se darr kar bhaag padey hain

Woh un par dhaank kar bandh kar di jayegi
(Is halat mei ke woh) unchey unchey sutuno mei (ghirey huey hongey)
Tumne dekha nahin ke tumhare Rubb ne haathi walon ke saath kya kiya
Kya usne unki tadbir ko akarat nahin kar diya
Aur un par parindo ke jhund ke jhund bhej diye
Jo un par pakey huey mitti ke patthar phenk rahey thay
Phir un ka yeh haal kar diya jaise janwaron ka khaya hua bhoosa
Chunke Quresh manoos huey
(yani) Jaadey(winter) aur garmi ke safaron se manoos
Lihaza un ko chahiye ke is ghar ke Rubb ki ibadat karein
Jisne unhein bhook se bacha kar khane ko diya aur khauf se bacha kar aman ata kiya
Tum ne dekha us shaks ko jo aakhirat ki jaza va saza ko jhutlata hai
Wahi to hai jo yateem ko dhakkey deta hai
Aur miskeen ka khana dene par nahin uksata
Phir tabahi hai un namaz padhne walon ke liye
Jo apni namaz se gaflat barat-tey hain
Jo riya-kaari(dikhawa) karte hai
Aur maamuli zarurat ki cheezen (logon ko) dene se gurez karte hai
(Aey Nabi ) Hum ne tumhein kausar ata kar diya
Pas tum apne Rubb hi ke liye namaz padho aur qurbani karo
Tumhara dushman hi jadh-kata hai
Kehdo ke aey kafiron
Main unki ibadat nahin karta jinki ibadat tum karte ho
Aur na tum uski ibadat karne wale ho jiski ibadat mai karta hoon
Aur na mai unki ibadat karne wala hoon jinki ibadat tum ne ki hai
Aur na tum uski ibadat karne waley ho jiski ibadat main karta hoon
Tumhare liye tumhara deen hai aur mere liye mera deen
Jab Allah ki madad aa jaye aur fatah naseeb ho jaye
Aur (aey Nabi s.a.s) tum dekh lo ke log fauj dar fauj Allah ke deen mein dakhil ho rahey hain
To apne Rubb ki hamd ke saath uski tasbeeh karo Aur us se magfirat ki duaa maango. Beshak woh bada tauba qabool karne wala hai
Toot gaye Abu Lahab ke haath aur na-murad ho gaya woh
Uska maal aur jo kuch us ne kamaya woh uske kisi kaam na aaya
Zaroor woh shola zan Aag mei dala jayega
Aur (us ke saath) us ki joru(wife) bhi lagai bujhai karne wali
Us ki gardan(neck) mein moonj ki rassi hogi
Kaho woh Allah hai, Yakta
Allah sab se bay-niyaz hai aur sab us kay mohtaj hain
Na uski koi aulad hai aur na woh kisi ki aulad
Aur koi uska humsar nahin hai
Kaho main panaah maangta hoon subah ke Rubb ki
Har us cheez ke shar se jo usne paida ki hai
Aur raat ki tareeki ke sharr se jab ke woh chaa jaye
Aur girhon mein phoonkne walon (ya waliyon) ke sharr se
Aur hasid(envies) ke sharr se jab ke woh hasad(envy) karey
Kaho, main panah maangta hoon insano ke Rubb
Insano ke badshah
Insano ke hakiki maabood ki
us waswasa dalne wale ke shar se jo baar baar palat kar aata hai
Jo logon ke dilon mei waswasey daalta hai
khwah woh jinno mein se ho ya Insano mein se
